body_html:
The packages for PyTorch 0.2 and Anaconda3(py3.5/3.6) on Windows x64(Windows 10, Windows Server 2016) is available now. Use the following command to install or update.

conda install -c peterjc123 pytorch
body_text:
The packages for PyTorch 0.2 and Anaconda3(py3.5/3.6) on Windows x64(Windows 10, Windows Server 2016) is available now. Use the following command to install or update.
conda install -c peterjc123 pytorch
body:
The packages for PyTorch 0.2 and Anaconda3(py3.5/3.6) on Windows x64(Windows 10, Windows Server 2016) is available now. Use the following command to install or update.
```CMD
conda install -c peterjc123 pytorch 
```
